resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104262</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104262</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212111</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Signal Circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Signal-Stromkreis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Circuit de Signal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Circuito Do Sinal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Circuito Del Segnale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύκλωμα σημάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Circuito De la Señal</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Why do the lights turn on in a room as soon as you flip a switch? Flip the switch and electrons slowly creep along a wire. The light turns on when the signal reaches it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Warum schalten die Lichter in einen Raum ein, 
sobald Sie einen Schalter leicht schlagen? Schlagen Sie den 
Schalter leicht und Elektronen kriechen langsam entlang eine Leitung. 
Das Licht schaltet ein, wenn das Signal es erreicht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pourquoi les lumières s'allument-elles dans une 
chambre dès que vous renverserez un commutateur ? Renversez le 
commutateur et les électrons rampent lentement le long d'un fil. 
La lumière s'allume quand le signal l'atteint.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Por que as luzes giram sobre em um quarto assim 
que você lançar um interruptor? Lance o interruptor e os 
elétrons rastejam lentamente ao longo de um fio. A luz gira 
sobre quando o sinal a alcança.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Perchè le luci accendono in una stanza non appena
lanciate un interruttore? Lanci l'interruttore e gli elettroni 
strisciano lentamente lungo un legare. La luce accende quando il
segnale la raggiunge.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γιατί τα φώτα ανοίγουν σε ένα δωμάτιο μόλις κτυπάτε
έναν διακόπτη; Κτυπήστε το διακόπτη και τα ηλεκτρόνια 
σέρνονται αργά κατά μήκος ενός καλωδίου. Το φως ανοίγει 
πότε το σήμα φθάνει σε το.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Por qué las luces se giran en un cuarto tan 
pronto como usted mueva de un tirón un interruptor? Mueva de un
tirón el interruptor y los electrones se arrastran lentamente a lo 
largo de un alambre. La luz se gira cuando la señal la alcanza.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212111</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104262</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/signal-circuit</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
